definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
(table tennis) edge ball/(fig.) actions that are technically legal but perhaps not respectable
fig. to rub one's fists and wipe one's palms (idiom)/to roll up one's sleeves for battle/eager to get into action or start on a task
to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
to keep one's eyes open (idiom)/to be on one's guard/to be clear-eyed

sentences.english: ChengKang found driving end be chafed, cognizance is concise.
sentences.chinese: 承康發現座駕車尾被擦花，認定是簡潔所爲。

sentences.english: The felt bodies are pounced both inside and out.
sentences.chinese: 氈體內外都擦得很光亮。

sentences.english: Don't cry, you know, no one will help you to wipe tears.
sentences.chinese: 不要流淚了，你要知道，沒有人會幫你擦眼淚。

sentences.english: I want to write on the blackboard, so I have to wipe all the words here out.
sentences.chinese: 我想在黑板上寫字，所以我必須把上面的單詞都擦去。

sentences.english: The words written by the pen smear easily.
sentences.chinese: 用鋼筆寫的字容易被擦模糊。
加入擦成細絲的檸檬皮。

sentences.english: A mechanical device that cleans the windshield .
sentences.chinese: 擦擋風玻璃的機械裝置。

sentences.english: The watch needs cleaning and oiling.
I can't imaging why you are so hot, please wipe out sweat on your face.
sentences.chinese: 我不能想象你爲什麼那麼熱，請把臉上的汗水擦去。

sentences.english: He buffed the wood until it shone.
She rubbed the key with a cloth, but the mark did not go away.
sentences.chinese: 她用布去擦鑰匙上的記號，但是擦不掉。

sentences.english: Wait a minute and I'll give my shoes a once-over.
sentences.chinese: 請稍等片刻，我把皮鞋略微擦一擦。

sentences.english: These spots are usually caused by bumps and scrapes to the base of your nails.
sentences.chinese: 這些白點通常是由於指甲根部受到碰撞和刮擦引起的。

sentences.english: He took a mop to the floor.
It’s no longer enough to simply slather some creamy concoction on dry skin.
sentences.chinese: 抗衰老已不再只是簡單往乾燥皮膚上擦面霜了。

sentences.english: His boots were small and neatly blacked.
sentences.chinese: 他的靴子很小，用黑靴油擦得很亮。
